column1: # title: A compilation of metabolic rate
column2: body mass and body temperature (where available) data for a range of vertebrate and invertebrate species

column1: # summary: Data on the resting metabolic rate
column2: body mass and body temperature data for a range of vertebrate and invertebrate taxa culled from the literature for a comprehensive study of scaling relationships.

column1: # : The data are global in extent.

column2: metabolic rate
A.
column4: N.M. (2025). A compilation of metabolic rate
column5: body mass and body temperature (where available) data for a range of vertebrate and invertebrate species (Version 1.0) [Data set]. NERC EDS UK Polar Data Centre. https://doi.org/10.5285/8d9ffd4a-16c0-4d48-9fc9-02988676ef78

column2: birds
column5: cephalopods and cnidarians were from previous compilations available in the published scientific literature.  Data for fish were compiled from published studies

column1: # comment: With the exception of the data for teleost fish
column2: data were extracted from the literature
column3: relying on quality control by the original compiler.  The fish data were edited to exclude data where fish were active
column4: or where the range of body mass was too small for scaling parameters to be determined with precision.

column1: # : The data have not been processed other than converting original units to SI where appropriate. For publication the data were analysed using Minitab (version 16) and R (version 4.4.2).

column2: Nadine M. Johnston
